channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed; Tesla Jumps on Earnings
item.description: U.S. stocks were mixed, with Tesla’s surprisingly strong results bolstering the tech-focused Nasdaq. The Nasdaq and S&P 500 gained, while the Dow indu...

item.title: A More Profitable Tesla Is Still a Pricey Ride
item.description: A surprise lift in automotive margins reversed the damage from the Robotaxi fallout, but the company’s valuation is now far above even AI stars.

item.title: Solventum Taps Bankers to Explore Sale of Filtration Unit
item.description: The business is expected to attract takeover interest from strategic and private-equity buyers.

item.title: Harley-Davidson’s stock falls as motorbike maker lowers guidance to reflect still-pressured consumer
item.description: Harley-Davidson’s stock was down Thursday, after the iconic motorbike maker topped estimates for the third quarter despite steep declines in profit an...

item.title: Crude Futures Turn Lower in Indecisive Trade
item.description: Crude futures gave up early gains as the market remains indecisive weighing Middle East risk premium against demand concerns.

item.title: Why stock investors have been on edge over the prospects of a total sweep for Republicans
item.description: A so-called “red wave” sweep of the White House and Congress would most likely make it easier to pass the Republican Party’s agenda, according to mark...

item.title: Comex Gold Settles Higher, Silver Falls
item.description: Gold settled 0.8% higher, up nine of the past 11 sessions, while silver fell nearly 0.1%, down for two consecutive sessions.

item.title: Why U.S.-Russia tensions have sent palladium prices soaring
item.description: Palladium futures rallied Thursday to their highest price of the year, buoyed by the suggestion of sanctions on exports of the metal from Russia, whic...

item.title: ‘I don’t trust my financial guy.’ I’m 67 and trying to live on $2.2K-a-month Social Security. I have $500K with an adviser, who charges 2%, but last year the return was 26%. What’s my move?
item.description: We spotted a lot of too-common red flags.

item.title: Jamie Dimon worries ‘World War III has already begun’
item.description: Adversaries of the United States “are clearly talking about dismantling the system,” the JPMorgan Chase CEO notes.
